title: On page 1A and 4A of the Monday, October 27,2014 was a story about an individual retiring. Pictures of the RV Cape Hatteras showed Life Savers heavily encased outside the Bridge and well out of reach of anyone on deck. Can you explain how they can be easily accessable?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/10/one-reach-life-saver-aboard-cfccs-research-vessel/
